```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(rvest)
library(stringr)
library(rtweet)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# Q1: scrape NYT homepage
nyt_url <- 'https://www.nytimes.com/'
article_titles <- read_html(nyt_url) %>%
  html_nodes('.story-heading') %>%
  html_text(trim = TRUE) %>%
  str_subset('.+')
article_titles[1:10]
```
